show_name: 100 Sleeping Princes and the Kingdom of Dreams: The Animation (TV)
other_title: Yume Ōkoku to Nemureru 100-Nin no Ōji-sama (Japanese)
夢王国と眠れる100人の王子様 (Japanese)
plot: In the dream world, dreams give people the power to live, but the world is threatened by dream-eating beings known as "Yumekui." In order to save the world, princes from all kingdoms must join their power. The butler Navi and Prince Avi of the knight kingdom Arstoria travel the world in order to save it.
